item.description:
Fun Meetup Presents FunMeetupGetaway , 4th of July Weekend Getaway

Join us this 4th of July Weekend for an amazing weekend of fun, check out the place at http://FunMeetupGetaway.com

 Mention FUNMeetup when booking to save $ and get a FREE DRINKS BOOK!!!

 Join us on the bus from NYC or meet up at camp !!!  ((Note: The Getaway Bus will sell out in advance AND The Weekend will close out in advance, usually by mid-June, Don't Get Closed out, Sign up today/ early June/ in advance!!! Signup requires a credit card committment, not just a meetup response)

 Any questions, call or text 917-868-4268

 THIS EVENT is expected to sell out WEEKS in advance, in early-mid June, don't wait until the last minute and get closed out, JOIN US FOR FUN :)

over 200 of us are already signed up,, weekend will close out soon, signup today, JOIN US FOR FUN ,,, http://FunMeetupGetaway.com or call/text 917-868-4268, Mention FunMeetup/Greg to save $ and get a Free Drinks Book !!!
item.how_to_find_us: call and text Greg at 917-868-4268, meet at dinner Friday Night !!!

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org
